Name: Alien world Millionaire
About the game: Online system: players can have 2-4 friends online about bug All bugs in the comment area have been repaired before may30,2020. If you have any new questions, please contact me immediately. gameplay Players can roll dice to randomly generate 1-6 points, and then move the corresponding steps. When they go to the open space, they can choose to buy real estate. When they go to the counting Road, they can add counting tickets. Buy land, collect tolls from others, use cards for them, and become a millionaire in the current world. stock market Real time stock market, players can buy stocks at any time Special stocks will float up and down according to some events generated by players in the game, and shareholders will have authority in special buildings. Let go, buy stocks, and crush competitors economically! gods Randomly refresh 11 gods in the map to make your life colorful. festivals There are specific events on specific festivals every year card With 52 different cards, please enjoy yourself. weather The weather will be generated randomly every day, and the weather lasts for 5-8 days. There are 8 different kinds of weather, some of which will occur in specific months. lottery Buy lottery tickets in a specific grid and draw prizes every month. Maybe the prize is you! magic house Use magic to react wonderfully to all players on the field Feedback bug: It can be filled in the feedback module of the main interface. Monopoly game exchange qq group: 1060671582
